page.title: 07INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: As this is a rural area, there are few actual information services. {Mobile Library Van}calls at Old Arley for 2.5 hours every Tuesday. A qualified librarian deals with queries There are no reference books but fiction and non-fiction books are for loan. {The Reading Room}at Astley, built in 1914, is now a local meeting place. {The Medical Centre}at Old Arley collects records for the surrounding area. A new{Computer Service}is just starting on the industrial estate on the old Pit Yard. There are 2 {sub-post offices}- one at Old Arley and one at New Arley.
